name: Transformalize.Batches.Postgres
description: Batch Create and Batch Write Tasks Needed for Bulk Actions.
author: Dale Newman

Arrangement.Text:
<cfg name="Batch Create Postgres" read-only="true" mode="@[Mode]">
 
  <maps>
     <add name="Modes">
       <items>
         <add from="Initialize" to="init" />
         <add from="Default" to="default" />
       </items>
    </add>
  </maps>
  
  <!-- this task creates and returns a batch id for logged in user -->
  
  <parameters>
    <add name="Mode" value="default" prompt="true" map="Modes" />
    <add name="Created" type="datetime" t="now()" />
    <add name="UserId" type="int" />
    <add name="UserName" />
    <add name="ReportContentItemId" />
    <add name="ReportTitle" />
    <add name="TaskContentItemId" />
    <add name="TaskTitle" />
    <add name="Description" />
  </parameters>
  
  <connections>
    <add name="db" provider="postgresql" database="Batches" user="postgres" password="*" />
  </connections>
  
  <actions>
    <add name="Create" 
         type="run" 
         description="Create the batch tables during in init mode."
         connection="db" 
         mode="init"
         command="
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS BatchStatus (
    Id INT NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY,
    Status VARCHAR(128) NOT NULL
);

INSERT INTO BatchStatus(Id,Status) SELECT 1, 'Review' WHERE NOT EXISTS(SELECT * FROM BatchStatus WHERE Id = 1);
INSERT INTO BatchStatus(Id,Status) SELECT 2, 'Running' WHERE NOT EXISTS(SELECT * FROM BatchStatus WHERE Id = 2);
INSERT INTO BatchStatus(Id,Status) SELECT 3, 'Completed' WHERE NOT EXISTS(SELECT * FROM BatchStatus WHERE Id = 3);
INSERT INTO BatchStatus(Id,Status) SELECT 4, 'Failed' WHERE NOT EXISTS(SELECT * FROM BatchStatus WHERE Id = 4);

/* GENERATED ALWAYS AS IDENTITY */
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS Batch (
    Id INT NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY,
    Created TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    UserId INT NOT NULL,
    Username VARCHAR(128) NOT NULL,
    ReportContentItemId VARCHAR(128) NOT NULL,
    ReportTitle VARCHAR(128) NOT NULL,
    TaskContentItemId VARCHAR(128) NOT NULL,
    TaskTitle VARCHAR(128) NOT NULL,
    Description VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    BatchStatusId INT,
    Message VARCHAR(1024) NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (BatchStatusId) REFERENCES BatchStatus(Id)
);

CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS IX_Batch_BatchStatusId ON Batch(BatchStatusId);" />
  </actions>
  
  <entities>
    <add name="Script" 
         input="db" 
         query="
                  INSERT INTO Batch(Id,Created,UserId,UserName,ReportContentItemId,ReportTitle,TaskContentItemId,TaskTitle,Description,BatchStatusId,Message)
                  SELECT COALESCE(MAX(Id),0)+1,@Created,@UserId,@UserName,@ReportContentItemId,@ReportTitle,@TaskContentItemId,@TaskTitle,@Description,1,'' 
                  FROM Batch;
                
                  SELECT b.Id AS BatchId
                  FROM Batch b
                  WHERE UserId = @UserId
                  ORDER BY b.Id DESC
                  LIMIT 1
                  ">
      <fields>
          <add name="BatchId" type="int" primary-key="true" />
      </fields>
    </add>
  </entities>
</cfg>

<cfg name="Batch" mode="@[Mode]">

  <maps>
     <add name="Modes">
       <items>
         <add from="Initialize" to="init" />
         <add from="Default" to="default" />
       </items>
    </add>
  </maps>
  
  <parameters>
    <add name="BatchId" type="int" value="0" />
    <add name="Mode" value="default" prompt="true" map="Modes" />
  </parameters>

  <connections>
    <!-- the bulk action controller in this module provides the input -->
    <add name="input" provider="internal" />
    <add name="output" provider="postgresql" database="Batches" user="postgres" password="*" />
  </connections>
  
  <entities>
    <add name="Record" update="false">
      <rows>
        <!-- orchard inserts rows -->
      </rows>
      <fields>
        <add name="BatchId" type="int" input="false" default="@[BatchId]" primary-key="true" />
        <add name="BatchValue" length="255" primary-key="true" />
      </fields>
    </add>
  </entities>
</cfg>

<cfg name="Batch Success">
 
  <parameters>
    <add name="BatchId" type="int" value="0" />
    <add name="RecordsAffected" type="int" value="0" />
  </parameters>
  
  <connections>
    <add name="db" provider="postgresql" database="Batches" user="postgres" password="devdev1!" />
  </connections>
  
  <actions>
    <add name="Create" 
         type="run" 
         connection="db" 
         command="UPDATE Batch 
                  SET BatchStatusId = 3,
                      Message = @RecordsAffected || ' Records Affected'
                  WHERE Id = @BatchId;" />
  </actions>

</cfg>

<cfg name="Batch Fail Postgres">
 
  <parameters>
    <add name="BatchId" type="int" value="0" />
    <add name="RecordsAffected" type="int" value="0" />
    <add name="Message" value="" />
  </parameters>
  
  <connections>
    <add name="db" provider="postgresql" database="Batches" user="postgres" password="*" />
  </connections>
  
  <actions>
    <add name="Create" type="run" connection="db" 
         command="UPDATE Batch 
                  SET BatchStatusId = 4,
                      Message = @RecordsAffected || ' Records Affected. ' || @Message
                  WHERE Id = @BatchId;" />
  </actions>

</cfg>
